scripts.predeploy: npm run build && powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'public/404.html' 'dist/' -Force; Copy-Item 'public/.nojekyll' 'dist/' -Force; Copy-Item 'public/_redirects' 'dist/' -Force; Copy-Item 'public/auth-redirect.html' 'dist/' -Force"
scripts.deploy-root: powershell -Command "Copy-Item 'public/root-index.html' $env:USERPROFILE\index.html -Force; Write-Host 'Manual step: Please upload index.html from your home directory to your root GitHub Pages repo'"
